text: I am VOTING for @JoeBiden.  He wont allow bounties on our troops & will have a coronavirus plan. Today's reminder DONALD TRUMP IS LETTING THE RUSSIANS KILL AMERICAN SOLDIERS AND LETTING CORONAVIRUS KILL AMERICANS.  HE DOES NOT WANT YOU TO TALK ABOUT THIS.   Please, do not RT!!!!
